price: 33. Kaši Allah azali te тропа kopesa bango etumbu mpe ozali kati na bango, тре Allah azali te тропа kopesa bango etumbu тре bango bazali kosenga bolimbisi.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
